trans-unit.source: This topic provides you with the information and pointers to set up your computer on which you will perform the steps to set up the hybrid integration scenario described in <link xlink:href="f8a58fb7-55dd-4c4a-a683-8688d7bda69c" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Sending a Flat File Message from an FTP Server to an On-Premise SQL Server Using EAI Bridge</link>.
trans-unit.target: This topic provides you with the information and pointers to set up your computer on which you will perform the steps to set up the hybrid integration scenario described in <link xlink:href="f8a58fb7-55dd-4c4a-a683-8688d7bda69c" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Sending a Flat File Message from an FTP Server to an On-Premise SQL Server Using EAI Bridge</link>.

trans-unit.source: You must do the following to set up your computer:
trans-unit.target: You must do the following to set up your computer:

trans-unit.source: You can download the installer from <externalLink><linkText>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=235057</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=235057</linkUri></externalLink>.
trans-unit.target: You can download the installer from <externalLink><linkText>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=235057</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=235057</linkUri></externalLink>.

trans-unit.source: You use this SDK to configure and deploy the <token>one-way</token> that picks flat-file messages from FTP Server, processes it, routes it to a relay endpoint, which then inserts the records into a SQL Server database.
trans-unit.target: You use this SDK to configure and deploy the <token>one-way</token> that picks flat-file messages from FTP Server, processes it, routes it to a relay endpoint, which then inserts the records into a SQL Server database.

trans-unit.source: You use this to expose the <embeddedLabel>Insert</embeddedLabel> operation on a SQL Server database table as a relay endpoint on <token>sb2</token>.
trans-unit.target: You use this to expose the <embeddedLabel>Insert</embeddedLabel> operation on a SQL Server database table as a relay endpoint on <token>sb2</token>.

trans-unit.source: You can download the installer from <externalLink><linkText>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=235057</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=235057</linkUri></externalLink>.
trans-unit.target: You can download the installer from <externalLink><linkText>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=235057</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=235057</linkUri></externalLink>.

trans-unit.source: Refer to the <token>af_integration</token> installation guide at <externalLink><linkText>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=237092</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=237092</linkUri></externalLink> to install the software prerequisites for <token>af_integration</token> SDK and <token>lobconnect</token>.
trans-unit.target: Refer to the <token>af_integration</token> installation guide at <externalLink><linkText>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=237092</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=237092</linkUri></externalLink> to install the software prerequisites for <token>af_integration</token> SDK and <token>lobconnect</token>.

trans-unit.source: Typically, if you were connecting to any other line-of-business (LOB) application by using <token>lobconnect</token>, you would also install client libraries for that specific LOB application.
trans-unit.target: Typically, if you were connecting to any other line-of-business (LOB) application by using <token>lobconnect</token>, you would also install client libraries for that specific LOB application.

trans-unit.source: However, in this case, because the connection is to a SQL Server instance, explicitly installing client libraries is not required because they are already installed as part of .NET Framework.
trans-unit.target: However, in this case, because the connection is to a SQL Server instance, explicitly installing client libraries is not required because they are already installed as part of .NET Framework.

trans-unit.source: This is required for installing the Adapter Pack on the computer.
trans-unit.target: This is required for installing the Adapter Pack on the computer.

trans-unit.source: This contains the SQL adapter that is required to establish connectivity to a SQL Server database and for exposing operations on SQL Server database tables.
trans-unit.target: This contains the SQL adapter that is required to establish connectivity to a SQL Server database and for exposing operations on SQL Server database tables.
